title: TEMPLATE Miniature hat cake boxes for 1:12 scale dollhouse | PDF
description: Miniature vintage boxes printable template. One A4 sheet contains 3 boxes with different sizes. Cut out the boxes along the outer lines, fold along the inner lines and glue as shown in the video. The sides of the boxes don't have fasteners for the top and bottom. They are glued precisely to the edge of the wall to ensure a pleasing appearance from the inside as well. Therefore, when gluing, try to adhere strictly to the markings; otherwise, the walls will end up slightly larâ€¦
